projects.title: html-webpack-multi-build-plugin
projects.description: This plugin simplifies the creation of script tags for module and nomodule for a webpack multi build configuration.
achievements: Created a multi build plugin for html-webpack-plugin
Set up bundles for ES6+ (modern) and ES5 (older browsers)

projects.title: VSCode Addon Jest Runner
projects.description: Simple way to run or debug a single or multiple Jest-Tests from context menu. As it is possible in IntelliJ / Webstorm
achievements: Created a VSCode Addon with Typescript
Runs Jest Tests from Context & Command Menu
5 star rating in Visual Studio Marketplace

projects.title: SendToKodi iOS App
projects.description: SendToKodi is a iOS App which resolves various video streams using youtube-dl to play them on Kodi
achievements: Created a kodi-addon (python) which extracts video streams from website urls with YoutubeDL
Set up a Travis CI job which regularly re-builds the kodi-addon with a recent YoutubeDL version
Developed a native iOS App with Swift which uses the integrated share option to send links to Kodi
Added an InApp Payment for multiple hosts
The InApp Payment achieves about 15$ a quater which is enough to pay the developer fee
Two other developers created Apps which make use of my python plugin (see Github Page)

projects.title: mfrc522-rpi
projects.description: JavaScript class to control MFRC522 RFID Module with your Raspberry-pi
achievements: Control MFRC522 Module with your Raspberry PI & Javascript
Reverse Engineered Arduino C++ Code to JavaScript (NodeJs)
